entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 3:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 8.1°C
Wind: WNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
